title: Talk About a Dumb Ox: A Primer on Thomas Aquinas
description: Deacon Eric and Tripp give an overview of who Thomas Aquinas was, who his influences were, and why they, a Catholic (soon to be priest) and Protestant layman philosopher find him and his work vitally important.
